Package cams.controller.enquiry

Class EnquiryManager

java.lang.Object
cams.controller.enquiry.EnquiryManager
public class EnquiryManager extends Object
This class handles the logic and processing related to enquiries.

  • Constructor Details

    • EnquiryManager

      public EnquiryManager()

  • Method Details

    • createEnquiry

      public static void createEnquiry(String campID, String message) throws ModelAlreadyExistsException
      Creates an enquiry and add it to the repository.
      Parameters:
      campID - ID of the camp the enquiry is regarding.
      message - The enquiry message.
      Throws:
      ModelAlreadyExistsException - if camp with ID cannot be found in repository.

    • deleteEnquiry

      public static void deleteEnquiry(String enquiryID) throws ModelNotFoundException, OperationCancelledException, AlreadyProcessedException
      Deletes an enquiry from the repository. Will ask the user for confirmation. Users cannot delete an enquiry if it has been processed.
      Parameters:
      enquiryID - ID of the enquiry.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - if enquiry with ID cannot be found in repository.
      OperationCancelledException - if operation cancelled by user.
      AlreadyProcessedException - if enquiry has already been processed.

    • editEnquiry

      public static void editEnquiry(String enquiryID, String newMessage) throws ModelNotFoundException, AlreadyProcessedException
      Edit enquiry message. Users cannot edit an enquiry if it has been processed.
      Parameters:
      enquiryID - ID of enquiry to message.
      newMessage - The new enquiry message.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - if enquiry cannot be found in repository.
      AlreadyProcessedException - if enquiry has already been processed.

    • getList

      public static List<Enquiry> getList()
      Gets a list of all the enquiries in the repository.
      Returns:
      list of enquiries in the repository.

    • getListByCampID

      public static List<Enquiry> getListByCampID(String campID)
      Gets a list of enquiries of a specific camp.
      Parameters:
      campID - ID of camp.
      Returns:
      List of enquiries of the specified camp.

    • getListByCampIDToReply

      public static List<Enquiry> getListByCampIDToReply(String campID)
      Gets a list of enquiries of a specific camp that can be replied to.
      Parameters:
      campID - ID of camp.
      Returns:
      List of enquiries of the specified camp.

    • getUserCreatedList

      public static List<Enquiry> getUserCreatedList()
      Gets a list of enquiries created by the user.
      Returns:
      list of enquiries created by the user.

    • getListByCampIDList

      public static List<Enquiry> getListByCampIDList(List<String> campIDList)
      Gets a list of enquiries of a list of camps.
      Parameters:
      campIDList - List of ID of the camps to get enquiries from.
      Returns:
      list of enquiries.

    • getUnprocessedListByCampIDList

      public static List<Enquiry> getUnprocessedListByCampIDList(List<String> campIDList)
      Gets a list of unprocessed enquiries of a list of camps.
      Parameters:
      campIDList - List of ID of the camps to get enquiries from.
      Returns:
      list of unprocessed enquiries.

    • replyToEnquiry

      public static void replyToEnquiry(String ID, String reply) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Reply to an enquiry.
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of enquiry to reply.
      reply - Reply message.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - if enquiry with ID is not found in repository.
